page.title: 13LEISURE IN THE GREAT PARK
page.content: The Park is a wonderful place for many kinds of activities. Members of the general public are freely allowed to enjoy walking (with or without a dog), cycling, picnicking and studying nature. Access is restricted in some areas to those who have a key (Â£8) and permits are required for riding (Â£40), fishing and shooting. Sponsored walks, rides and runs take place here and much money is raised for charity. The Marathon course of the Carriage Driving Championships runs through this area. Spectators appreciate the strength of the horses and the skill of the drivers. The Queen graciously allows her people to relax in these beautiful surroundings.
